preheaderText:
Get a great start to 2021 with bonus points, 
chances to win and more.
previewText: Get a great start to 2021 with bonus points, chances to win and more.

NU.name: S2A_1_25th_Anniversary
NU.title: There’sstill time to enter to win 1 million points.
NU.copy:
It’sour 25th birthday and we’re celebrating by giving away 250 prizes of 1million Petro-Points2. For your chance to win, tell us how you celebratedyour birthday OR how you made someone else’s birthday special. Hurry, contestcloses February 8th, 2021.

Need some inspiration? Check out some storiesthat have been submitted so far.

NU.name: S2B_2_Wash_Go_Card
NU.title: Cleanup with this car wash special.
NU.imageAlt: 5 ofour best washes for $55. That's $10 off our regular price (Wash & Gocard).
NU.legalCopy: ^ Regular price $60. Plus applicable taxes. Valid for use at any Petro-Canada™ SuperWash™ of GlideWash™ location. Receive 1 extra car wash loaded onto theWash & Go card upon successful online registration and/or reload of anexisting card. In order to register your card, you must have an onlinePetro-Points account. Offer available until March 15, 2021.
